capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to find the first available consecutive pair of numbers from an array of already allocated integers given a starting integer and an ending integer

entryPoint.name: Allocate a Pair of Numbers - IAP

inputs.name: startRange
inputs.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for the range between which a pair of numbers is allocated

inputs.name: endRange
inputs.description: Upper bound (inclusive) for the range between which a pair of numbers is allocated

outputs.name: assigned
outputs.description: An array of the first availble consecutive pair if found. Otherwise, it will be false

name: Allocate a Pair of Numbers - IAP
overview: Find the first available consecutive pair of numbers from an array of already allocated integers given a starting integer and an ending integer
webName: Allocate a Pair of Numbers - IAP
